name: Shannon Hoey
text: Two words: GLUTEN FREE!!!! Yes, they have gluten free options. My family and I love the gluten free pizza as well as the regular pizza. Two family members have celiacs disease and they do a good job of preventing cross contamination. They have NOT gotten sick any of the times we've eaten here :)

text: Advertised a 'buffet.' You were allowed one slice at a time, and when you wanted another, you had to go up and order one, and then wait for it to come. Makes for an extremely slow paced buffet especially if youre a big eater. Just a pain, ‚Ä¶More
